title: Cafe Habibi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern
description: Designed as a place for people to meet, eat a meal, and have drinks together. Around 50% the Indian menu is vegan, and staff is accommodating in requests to turn vegetarian meals to vegan. Offers fair trade coffee, home-baked cakes, a Sunday brunch buffet featuring many vegan dishes. No microwave used.
